CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Filtered by Quality Inspection stage positioned above or below the Delivered to Retail stage?
SRP.A: The Filtered by Quality Inspection stage is positioned {above} the Delivered to Retail stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Processing?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Processing is {15703}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Filtered by Quality Inspection?
VE.A: The value of stage Filtered by Quality Inspection is {7851}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Packaged for Distribution?
VE.A: The value of stage Packaged for Distribution is {3258}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Post-Processing, with a value of {15703}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Delivered to Retail, with a value of {2877}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Processing to stage Filtered by Quality Inspection?
SC.A: Decreased by {7852} Tons from stage Post-Processing to stage Filtered by Quality Inspection.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Packaged for Distribution to stage Delivered to Retail?
SC.A: Decreased by {381} Tons from stage Packaged for Distribution to stage Delivered to Retail.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 3067? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Post-Processing} stage has {15703}, the {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stage has {7851}, the {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {3258}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 11777? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stage has {7851}, the {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {3258}, the {Delivered to Retail} stage has {2877}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 1438 and 11777? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stage has {7851}, the {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {3258}, the {Delivered to Retail} stage has {2877}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail, or from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to Packaged for Distribution?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Filtered by Quality Inspection} to {Packaged for Distribution} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail, or from stage Post-Processing to Filtered by Quality Inspection?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Processing} to {Filtered by Quality Inspection} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail, from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to Packaged for Distribution, or from stage Post-Processing to Filtered by Quality Inspection?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Processing} to stage {Filtered by Quality Inspection} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Post-Processing} and {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Packaged for Distribution} and {Delivered to Retail} stages.
